title: Python Systems
content: Experienced using Python for backend services, data pipelines, and experimentation, with emphasis on readable code, profiling, and incremental optimization in production-like environments.

title: Machine Learning
content: Hands-on experience training, evaluating, and iterating ML models, focusing on data quality, baselines, and error analysis rather than blind model complexity.

title: Systems Debugging
content: Ability to diagnose performance and reliability issues using metrics, traces, and hypothesis-driven investigation under time and operational constraints.

title: Problem Solving
content: Approaches ambiguous problems by decomposing them, validating assumptions, and iterating toward evidence-backed solutions instead of premature optimization.

title: Technical Communication
content: Communicates complex technical ideas clearly through documentation, diagrams, and structured explanations tailored to different audiences.

title: Team Leadership
content: Provides direction and structure in team settings by clarifying goals, delegating tasks, and supporting peers rather than centralizing decisions.

title: Mentorship
content: Supports less experienced teammates through pairing, feedback, and documentation, enabling long-term contribution rather than short-term fixes.

title: Adaptability
content: Adjusts approaches when assumptions fail, whether due to data limitations, cultural differences, or unclear problem definitions.

title: Intellectual Curiosity
content: Motivated by understanding how and why systems work, even when exploration leads to negative or inconclusive results.

title: Impact Focus
content: Prioritizes meaningful outcomes and learning over external recognition, especially in collaborative and experimental settings.

title: Collaboration
content: Believes strong technical results emerge from shared ownership, clear communication, and respect for diverse perspectives.

title: Inclusivity
content: Values making technical knowledge accessible and welcoming, especially for learners from nontraditional or underserved backgrounds.

title: Resilience
content: Views setbacks as signals to reflect and adapt rather than reasons to disengage from challenging technical work.

title: Clarity
content: Values clear reasoning and documentation to reduce ambiguity and enable others to build effectively on prior work.

title: Graduate Research
content: Pursue a research-focused graduate degree to develop rigorous problem formulation, experimental design, and theoretical grounding.

title: PhD Path
content: Prepare for a potential PhD by building depth in systems and machine learning research through mentorship and publication-quality work.

title: Inclusive Teaching
content: Continue teaching and mentoring students from diverse backgrounds alongside advanced technical training.

title: Technical Leadership
content: Grow into roles that combine deep technical contribution with guiding teams through complex engineering decisions.

title: System Builder
content: Design and deploy reliable, scalable systems that translate theoretical ideas into real-world impact.

title: Latency Reduction
content: Reduced P95 API latency by approximately 38% during an internship through targeted caching and indexing changes.

title: Hackathon Output
content: Delivered a functional ML prototype and accompanying error analysis under a 48-hour deadline.

title: Course Recognition
content: Received strong instructor feedback for code quality and teamwork in a multi-person software engineering project.

title: Mentorship Impact
content: Helped onboard junior teammates who later independently owned and delivered features.

title: Outreach Participation
content: Volunteered consistently in introductory programming workshops, supporting multiple cohorts of high school students.
